task.summary: Added telegram bot controller and bot validator.
Added converter to BotController. Changed BotValidator isNumber method to isCorrectNumber method.
Created Transaction class, User class Created TransactionDaoImpl class, which writes and reads users conversations
Changed flags count to one in BotController class. Changed exceptions handling.
Created equals methods in User and Transaction class. Created constructors in TransactionDaoImpl class. Changed messages in BotController class. Added test class for TransactionDaoImpl
Changed bot's logic to easier. Changed getByDate(Date) method. Added tests for this method
